com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.persistence.cassandra

Interface CassandraReadSide


  • public interface CassandraReadSide
    Cassandra read side support. This should be used to build and register a read side processor.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  CassandraReadSide.ReadSideHandlerBuilder<Event extends AggregateEvent<Event>>
      Builder for the handler.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        @Deprecated
<Event extends AggregateEvent<Event>> void register(Class<? extends CassandraReadSideProcessor<Event>> processorClass)
        Deprecated. Use the builder method to create and register a Cassandra read side processor.
        At system startup all CassandraReadSideProcessor classes must be registered with this method.

      • builder

        <Event extends AggregateEvent<Event>> CassandraReadSide.ReadSideHandlerBuilder<Event> builder(String readSideId)
        Create a builder for a Cassandra read side event handler.
        Parameters:
        readSideId - An identifier for this read side. This will be used to store offsets in the offset store.
        Returns:
        The builder.
